casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick GIBBS. No. 564P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of October 2004 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
